description:
40% Attack Speed
25% Critical Strike Chance
4% Move Speed

Night Vigil
Gain 30 Ultimate Ability Haste.

Opening Barrage (0s)
After casting your Ultimate, your next 3 basic attacks within 8 seconds gain 50% Attack Speed and Critically Strike for 75% of your normal Critical Strike damage. If an attack would already Critically Strike, it deals normal Critical Strike damage and also deals 10% bonus true damage.
name: Fiendhunter Bolts
